donations.name: World Food Programme
donations.mission: End hunger, approve food security and nutrition by 2030.

donations.name: Feeding Kenya
donations.mission: End Hunger in Kenya especially in the North-Eastern part of the country.

donations.name: Non-Profit Organization
donations.mission: Advocate for policies that create long-term solutions to hunger.

donations.name: World Hunger Relief Farm
donations.mission: Alleviate hunger through education, research, and sustainable agriculture.

donations.name: Rise Against Hunger
donations.mission: End hunger by empowering communities, nourishing lives and responding to emergencies.

donations.name: Welt Hunger Hilfe
donations.mission: Create a world in which all people have the opportunity to live a self-determined life in dignity and justice, free from hunger and poverty.

donations.name: Hunger Task Force
donations.mission: Hunger Task Force believes that every person has a right to healthy food obtained with dignity. We work to prevent hunger and malnutrition by providing food to people in need today and by promoting social policies to achieve a hunger free community tomorrow.
